Regulation Name(s): Calculator/data processing module for clinical use
Specimen Type(s): Whole blood (capillary, fingertip, palm at base of thumb, forearm)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for iBGStar Blood Glucose Monitoring System and Diabetes Manager Application using Apple Lightning adapter for quantitative measurement and management of blood glucose levels in capillary whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative measurement of blood glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from the fingertip, palm, or forearm by a single patient for self-testing at home as an aid to monitor diabetes control; Diabetes Manager Application used to email glucose readings to healthcare providers for review and management support.
